lead_paragraph: While the case is a win for the music industry, it comes a week after a rival agency lost an appeal to Pandora in a royalty case.

headline.print_headline: BMI Wins in Royalty Case Against Pandora
headline.main: Ruling in Royalty Case Gives BMI a Victory Against Pandora

snippet: While the case is a win for the music industry, it comes a week after a rival agency lost an appeal to Pandora in a royalty case.
abstract: BMI wins decision in lawsuit against Pandora Media; streaming service will be forced to raise rate of royalties it pays to artists to 2.5 percent from 1.75 percent.
